mapper.select: select m.userid, rownum, m.userid, nickname, username, tel, to_char(signupdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') signupdate, to_char(withdrawdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') withdrawdate, deleted ,creator_state from member m full outer join creator c on m.userid = c.userid where grade = '크리에이터'
select count(deleted) from member m join creator c on m.userid=c.userid where m.deleted='회원' and c.creator_state='승인'
select count(*) from member where deleted='탈퇴' and grade = '크리에이터'
select category, m.nickname, picture, c.userid from creator c join member m on c.userid = m.userid
select picture, nickname, sns_addr, creator_info from member m join creator cre on m.userid=cre.userid where cre.userid='${param1}'
select creator_info, class_name, real_price, class_img1 from creator cre join class cla on cla.userid=cre.userid where cre.userid='${param1}'
mapper.update: update member set nickname =#{nickname}, username=#{username}, tel=#{tel} ,gender=#{gender}, zipcode=#{zipcode}, addr =#{addr},detailaddr =#{detailaddr} where userid = #{userid}
update member set deleted='탈퇴',withdrawdate=sysdate where userid =#{userid}
